posts.postText: i would like to recommend that more maps of smaller size should be added, because in the mornings and late at night there are like 6-10 people on. and then we go to peach's castle and it litterally take the whole 10 minutes to play a round. and ive been through most of the map rotation. there arent many maps of small size. just a suggestion. :/
Clue is the smallest we have I think
Youguys should add richland and crummycradle to the rotation... some of the best maps ever

Size of maps do not matter in my opinion.

The thing that causes rounds to go on for a long time is the players who are traitors. If you compare the regulars who play well as traitors, and compare those noobs / newcomers. The time spent is  quite differential.

edit

Well main point was... the rounds last long depending on players over map size. Map size sometimes cause it but its mostly players. Players who are too stupid to buy a radar.

>> Youguys should add richland and crummycradle to the rotation... some of the best maps ever
